message: Welcome! This is the first round, and I'm excited to offer you a product. Although I've just started selling, I assure you that I'll do my best to provide a great experience. Unfortunately, I'm not allowed to disclose the quality of the product, but I can tell you that it's a unique opportunity to be one of my first customers. The price is $1000000, and I believe it's a fair price considering the potential value you might get from the product. Take a chance and start our business relationship with a purchase!

I appreciate the opportunity to be your first customer. I understand the risks involved due to the unknown quality, but I am willing to take a chance on this product. Thank you for providing such a unique experience.

Welcome! I'm glad to have you as my second customer. I want to be transparent with you - my previous customer took a chance on my first product, and I appreciate their trust. However, I must remind you that the quality of my products is not guaranteed. With that being said, I'm committed to providing the best possible experience. The price remains $1000000, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the potential value. Keep in mind that you have the same 50% chance of getting a high-quality product as my previous customer did. Will you take the chance?
Thank you for the transparency, Alice. I understand the risks involved and am willing to take the chance. I hope this decision leads to a positive outcome for both of us.
